about_the_game:
About the game:

Dualis is an isometric horror thriller whose plot will take you to an underground research complex. In this place, you will have to fight not only for your life, but also to understand if you really exist. What is consciousness and personality are the questions you will have to ask yourself. This is a story-oriented game that combines stealth action with survival horror elements in an isometric perspective.

Available episodes:

Episode 1- Available
Episode 2- In development
Episode 3- In Development
Episode 4- In Development

Story:

The story of the game takes place in an underground research complex. As a result of an unknown incident, the staff of the complex has lost their minds and turned into ruthless monsters intent on killing anyone they meet. Adam, wakes up in the very epicenter of a nightmare. Stripped of his memories he searches for a way out of this nightmare. As he travels, Adam realizes that the walls of the complex hide questions that he would rather not know the answers to. In this abyss Adam faces not only the creatures of the complex, but also the hidden edges of his mind, looking into which he will never be the same again.

The The story of Dualis take place in an underground scientific research complex and asks tough questions and requires players to make difficult decisions that may affect the story's finale.

Gameplay:

Dualis gameplay is a blend of stealth-action with survival horror elements. The decision whether to act stealthily, eliminating enemies silently, or to collect ammo and items left in the level and start an open fight is entirely in the player's hands. In Dualis, enemies are a deadly threat, especially when there are many of them, and each player will face a difficult choice in how to confront them. This dilemma gives the players to choose their own style of survival in each situation.

In addition to fiery encounters, you'll have to call on logic to solve puzzles. This may be required both to progress through the story and to obtain additional equipment at critical moments. The refreshing contribution of puzzle solving adds a layer of depth to the game, requiring the player to not only be dexterous in firefights, but also to think strategically in situations where intelligence may be his most powerful weapon.

Key features:


  • Story:
    The story of Dualis asks tough questions and requires players to make difficult decisions that may affect the story's finale.
  • Stealth action with elements of survival horror
    The gameplay of Dualis is based on the use of stealth to avoid encounters with enemies, while introducing survival elements. Players are given the choice to either move slowly and cautiously, hiding from danger, or to take risks and fight enemies, but at the risk of their lives and resources. This approach allows players to choose their own survival path.
  • Isometric Perspective:
    The isometric perspective, gives a unique visual look and allows for a new take on the stealth action genre.
  • Enemies:
    Dangerous enemies that are deadly even on their own. They react to noises made by the character, creating dynamic and dangerous situations and requiring the player to be vigilant every step of the way
  • Inventory Management:
    Manage your resources and inventory carefully by making strategic decisions on how to collect and use items. Create optimal equipment sets to effectively overcome challenges and ensure survival within the walls of the complex.
